__e: Lloyd... this is your Dutch uncle again, and I'm telling you... stay away from that born-again with feelings about serial killers.
First, Mr. Thornton has a general rundown for you on serial killers.
We all know about serial killers.

We all know about serial killers.
I do not want to be the next target. I do not want murderers in my house.
You have your murderers and your evidence.
I want to promise you, in front of this people, that I will find the murderers, and that I will kill them.
I wanted to get rid of the Seven Killers and it just so happened that you were here
